Package index

Model explanation

Functional decomposition of model predictions

glex()
Global explanations for tree-based models.
glex_vi()
Variable Importance for Main and Interaction Terms

Visualisation

Visualize main and interaction terms

autoplot(<glex>) plot_main_effect() plot_threeway_effects() plot_twoway_effects()
Plot Prediction Components
plot_pdp()
Partial Dependence Plot
autoplot(<glex_vi>)
Plot glex Variable Importances
glex_explain()
Explain a single prediction

Utility functions

subset_components() subset_component_names()
Subset components
print(<glex>)
Print glex objects
theme_glex()
A ggplot2 theme for glex plots

bike
Bikesharing data
